data.text: @bells565 We are trying to reply to you via direct message. Please follow us on Twitter so that our direct messages can reach you.

@bells565 Thank you for contacting Frontier Airlines. I apologize for the delayed response. I'm sorry to hear about your COVID situation and we understand your decision to postpone your travel. Kindly submit your proof of COVID Test in the link below so we can look into it. -Cindy

@NC_Beer_Wench Hi there, Thank you for contacting Frontier Airlines, and I do apologize for the late response due to the volume of messages that we are receiving. To check all the information, may I have the reservation code, and passenger's name, please?-Gretchen

@cgluv77 @briankelllly Good afternoon @cgluv77 (gluv), thank you for reaching out today. We are sorry to hear your experience. For farther assistance, please send us a DM with your confirmation code and full name.- Rebeca

@ItsMarcklyne Thank you for your feedback. Feel free to send us a direct message or call us at 602-333-5925 TTY:711 in case you have concerns with your flight experience that require further assistance. -Ella

@virtuousmoon Hi there, Thank you for contacting Frontier Airlines and I do apologize for the late response due to the volume of messages at the moment. To check all the information, may I have the reservation code, please?-Gretchen
@FSidepiece Hi, there! Thank you for reaching out. We are sorry to hear your experience. Please send us a private message with your confirmation code and full name so we can assist you. - Maria

@_delanna Hello _delanna, thanks for reaching out. We truly apologize for any inconvenience your flight may have caused you. Please send us a DM along with your flight details so we may further assist you. We look forward to hearing from you. -Kris

urls.title: Green
urls.description: A whole new way to fly.

data.text: So, how do lighter seats translate to being ‘green’? Well, less weight creates greater fuel efficiency. Weighing 30% less than our older model, the fuel savings provided by our new premium @recaro_as seats is outstanding! Read more here: https://t.co/3OlMttJoO9 https://t.co/CXRPeyhKHD
